name: Mycelium (alexgrim)
description:
Mycelium is a turn-based RPG, set in the world of constant, non-ending war between two world capitals. A company of wanderers meet in the ancient cave system, infamous among citizens. Glory, wisdom and treasures await adventurers there, though not everyone are able of carrying them outside. Main cast of vast characters, driven by their conflicting motives try to pull through and escape the Mycelium.

This game features unordinary battle system with precendency of enemies acting and you being in defensive position, managing people, who can easily fall unconcious in merely 3 hits. Also, using unique abilities of characters requires completing small mini-games.

Gameplay and storyline influence each other equally, with mechanic elements changing from story events and fate being changed by your strategic decisions. One of the forms is a relation chart system, in which relations between characters are created from your actions in battle.  Those relations inflict buffs and debuffs on the pairs of characters, bearing them.

Game is in development now, this build consists of 2 chapters out of 7. Current progress: 3.5/7 chapters. It is available in 2 languages: English and Russian.

Your feedback is appreciated!
